entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:59 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 42. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
